channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- System Storage Virtualization Engine
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- System Storage Virtualization Engine

item.title: CVE-2023-49878|2024-09-16T18:38:35.960Z -- ibm -- system%20storage%20virtualization%20engine
item.description: IBM System Storage Virtualization Engine TS7700 3957-VEC, 3948-VED and 3957-VEC could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information when a detailed technical error message is returned in the browser. This information could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 272652.
